learning_outcomes.description: Structure and carry out workplace tasks thoughtfully and intelligently.
Develop and express a critical and reflexive perspective on work tasks.

assessments.assessment_title: Identify a problem in the workplace
assessments.task_description:
Identify a problem or opportunity in the workplace where you are undertaking your internship. It could be a system that could be streamlined, a lack of documentation in some aspect of work flow, or an idea for software or equipment that would make things easier for management or employees. Write up a 700-1,000 word proposal:


  • Paragraph 1: a concise statement of the problem or opportunity (9 marks)
  • Paragraphs 2 & 3: your ideas for resolving it (15 marks)
  • Paragraph 4: any resourcing issues applicable to your solution (6 marks)


(See Criteria for Case Study Link for more info)


Feel free to talk through with your internship provider, but please make sure they know this is a hypothetical only. If they want you to implement the solution, they will let you know.

assessments.category: Notebook/ Logbook, Participation/ Student contribution, Placement, Reflection
assessments.task_description:
The student will submit a reflective journal of 2,500-3,000 words, based on experiences and observations during their internship. The journal may include up to 1500 words of written material, if such written material was composed for the internship provider, for example, media releases, blog posts, editorial reports. If there is a commercial-in-confidence requirement at your workplace, you will need to de-identify these before submission.
